title: #HimToo? Oscars chief hit with sexual harassment claims
text:
#HimToo? Oscars chief hit with sexual harassment claims Friday, March 16, 2018 - 01:01 
John Bailey - the president of the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences - is under investigation by the organization after three people accused him of sexual harassment. The news broke in the trade magazine Variety, and comes amid the #MeToo movement which saw Harvey Weinstein kicked out of the Academy and Casey Affleck replaced as a presenter at this year's Oscars.
